Description: Enhancements towards the wills system of the game, adding systems like moving wills, control-z, auto saving, and more!

CheckboxSettings.Name: Auto-save will
CheckboxSettings.Description: Will save your will whenever you deselect the text of your will or 2 seconds after you stop typing.

CheckboxSettings.Name: Control-Z
CheckboxSettings.Description: Allows you to undo/redo text on your will/notepad/etc.

CheckboxSettings.Name: Player Notes Standalone
CheckboxSettings.Description: Player Notes will be its own object separated from the Notepad.

CheckboxSettings.Name: Show dead player's will fast
CheckboxSettings.Description: Will show dead player's will and death note (if any) on the same WDAH as they died in.

CheckboxSettings.Name: Auto-hide dead players
CheckboxSettings.Description: "Hide dead players" on the Player Notes is turned on by default.

CheckboxSettings.Name: Hide self from Player Notes
CheckboxSettings.Description: Will hide your number from the Player Notes.

DropdownSettings.Name: Middle-click Functionality
DropdownSettings.Description:
Adds a special ability to your middle click
Save: will save your will
Centralize: will set every movable object to the default position
Go here: will instantly teleport all visible movable objects to where your mouse is.
